oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Jerry Salley - 2018-03-31
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Jerry Salley from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 31, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jerry Salley;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments begin in progress by Sara Lederach along with songwriter introduction / (03:15) Opening comments by Jerry and introduction of first song / (03:48) Performs I Fell In The Water / (06:18) Talks about the song hold process in Nashville / (07:26) Introduces the next song / (9:00) Performs I'm Gonna Take That Mountain / (12:15) Talks about Chris Stapleton / (13:37) Introduces the next song / (15:49) Performs Saving Grace / (20:24) Interacts with the audience and promotes his merchandise / (23:54) Introduces his next song / (25:35) Performs The Night Flatt and Scruggs Played Carnegie Hall / (28:46) Promotes his website / (29:31) Answers question about who he would like to have his songs recorded by that hasn't yet / (30:24) Answers question about who he'd like to co-write with and talks about Tom T. Hall's influence on him / (31:23) Answers question about artist changing his songs during the recording of it /

(32:30) Answers question about Mark Chesnutt recording his song / (33:29) Answers question about co-writing and talks about how hard it is today for songwriters to make a living / (36:31) Answers question about lyric rhyme schemes / (38:38) Answers question about teaching at his songwriting workshop / (40:12) Answers question about writing lyrics or music first / (41:38) Introduces the next song / (43:05) Performs Broken Ones / (46:32) Final comments / (47:18) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Salley, Jerrry; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
